entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is the teacher who dismissed the students and demonstrated the Cruciatus Curse. (Excerpt: 'Moody had dismissed them and they had left the classroom...')

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a student who was present in the classroom during Moody's lesson. (Excerpt: 'They were talking about the lesson, Harry thought, as though it had been some sort of spectacular show...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who was present in the classroom during Moody's lesson. (Excerpt: 'Nor, it seemed, had Hermione.')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a student who was present in the classroom during Moody's lesson. (Excerpt: 'Not the ruddy library again?' said Ron.)

entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is a student who was present in the classroom during Moody's lesson and seemed to be traumatized by the Cruciatus Curse. (Excerpt: 'Neville was standing alone, halfway up the passage...')

entities.name: cruciatus curse
entities.description: The Cruciatus Curse is a spell that Moody demonstrated in class. (Excerpt: 'Moody had demonstrated the Cruciatus Curse.')

relationships.description: Moody demonstrated the Cruciatus Curse in class. (Excerpt: 'Moody had demonstrated the Cruciatus Curse.')
Harry thought about Moody's lesson and how it was not entertaining. (Excerpt: 'They were talking about the lesson, Harry thought, as though it had been some sort of spectacular show...')
Hermione was concerned about Neville's well-being after the lesson. (Excerpt: '“Neville?” Hermione said gently.')
Ron did not like going to the library, as mentioned in his conversation with Harry. (Excerpt: 'Not the ruddy library again?' said Ron.)
Neville was traumatized by the Cruciatus Curse, as evidenced by his horrified expression. (Excerpt: 'Neville was standing alone, halfway up the passage...')
